import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { whenSubmit(form :NgForm){ console.log(form); } }
